pr_title: Adding axis2.xml properties and other carbon server and catalina related configs

timeline.bodyText: Can we call it HTTP Servlet Transport ?
timeline.author: dushaniw

timeline.bodyText: Similarly may be HTTPS Servlet Transport?

+        {
+            "title": "HTTP Transport (catalina-server)",
+            "options": [
+                {
+                    "name": "transport.http.properties",
+                    "required": true,
+                    "description": "This configuration header is required for configuring the parameters that are used for tuning the default HTTP catalina server transport of the API Manager.",
+                    "params": [
+                        {
+                            "name": "port",
+                            "type": "integer",

+                        {

+                            "default": "false",

+                            "description": ""
+                        },
+                        {
+                            "name": "maxHttpHeaderSize",

+                            "required": true,
+                            "default": "8192",
+                            "possible": "-",
+                            "description": ""
+                        },
+                        {
+                            "name": "acceptorThreadCount",
+                            "type": "integer",
+                            "required": true,
+                            "default": "2",
+                            "possible": "-",
+                            "description": ""
+                        },
+                        {

+                            "type": "integer",
+                            "required": true,
+                            "default": "250",
+                            "possible": "-",
+                            "description": ""
+                        },
+                        {
+                            "name": "minSpareThreads",

+                            "required": true,
+                            "default": "50",
+                            "possible": "-",
+                            "description": ""
+                        },
+                        {
+                            "name": "disableUploadTimeout",
+                            "type": "boolean",
+                            "required": true,
+                            "default": "false",
+                            "possible": "\"true\" or \"false\"",
+                            "description": ""
+                        },
+                        {
+                            "name": "connectionUploadTimeout",
+                            "type": "integer",
+                            "required": true,
+                            "default": "120000",
+                            "possible": "-",
+                            "description": ""
+                        },
+                        {
+                            "name": "maxKeepAliveRequests",
+                            "type": "integer",
+                            "required": true,
+                            "default": "120000",

+                        {
